insert into crm_service_fault_use_material (id, service_id, material_id, material_name, material_model, norms_id, oper_number, unit_price, all_price, remark, create_id, create_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.serviceId}, #{item.materialId}, #{item.materialName}, #{item.materialModel}, #{item.mUnitId}, #{item.operNumber}, #{item.unitPrice}, #{item.allPrice}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createId}, #{item.createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(b.oper_number), 0) - IFNULL((SELECT SUM(c.oper_number) FROM crm_service_fault_use_material c WHERE c.norms_id = b.m_unit_id AND c.create_id = a.create_id AND c.service_id != d.service_id #查询的库存不包含当前工单的已用数量 ), 0) currentTock, d.material_id productId, d.norms_id normsId, d.oper_number operNumber, d.unit_price unitPrice, d.all_price allPrice, d.remark, em.`name` productName, em.model productModel, em.unit, CASE em.unit WHEN '1' THEN em.unit_name WHEN '2' THEN eu.`name` ELSE '' END unitName FROM crm_service_apply a, crm_service_apply_material b, crm_service_fault_use_material d LEFT JOIN erp_material em ON d.material_id = em.id LEFT JOIN erp_material_norms emn ON d.norms_id = emn.id LEFT JOIN erp_unit eu ON emn.unit_id = eu.id WHERE a.create_id = #{userId} AND a.state = '1' AND a.id = b.apply_id AND b.m_unit_id = d.norms_id AND d.service_id = #{id} GROUP BY b.m_unit_id

SELECT a.id, a.order_num orderNum,#工单号 IFNULL(b.`name`, '') serviceTypeName,#服务类型 CONVERT(a.declaration_time, CHAR) declarationTime,#报单时间 a.contacts,#联系人 a.phone,#联系电话 a.email, #邮箱 a.qq, #qq a.service_time serviceTime, #派工时间 a.customer_name customerName,#客户名称 IFNULL(o.`name`, '') addressProvince,#省 IFNULL(p.`name`, '') addressCity,#市 IFNULL(q.`name`, '') addressArea, #区、乡、县 IFNULL(r.`name`, '') addressTownship, #镇、街道 IFNULL(a.address_detailed, '') addressDetailed #详细地址 FROM crm_service a LEFT JOIN t_area o ON a.address_province = o.id LEFT JOIN t_area p ON a.address_city = p.id LEFT JOIN t_area q ON a.address_area = q.id LEFT JOIN t_area r ON a.address_township = r.id, crm_service_type b WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.type_id = b.id AND a.state = 5
mapper.insert: INSERT into crm_service_evaluate (id, service_id, type_id, content, `type`, create_id, create_time) VALUES(#{id}, #{serviceId}, #{typeId}, #{content}, #{type}, #{createId}, #{createTime})
